links.*: Edge of the Wild (Tolkien art exhibit)
The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)

wikitext.*:
<noinclude>{{month|August}}
Events that occurred on 14 August
==On Earth==
</noinclude>
* '''[[1954]]''' - [[C.S. Lewis]] [[The Gods Return to Earth|reviews ''The Fellowship of the Ring'']] for ''Time and Tide''.
* '''[[1972]]''' - Richard Jeffery sends a letter to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] (see [[Letter 347]]).
* '''[[1976]]''' - [[Mythcon 7]] in [[wikipedia:Sacramento, California|Sacramento]], [[wikipedia:California|California]].
* '''[[1982]]''' - The fifth episode of the new version of the [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|1981 radio series]] of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' is aired on [[BBC|BBC Radio 4]].
* '''[[1982]]''' - [[Dorothy Whitelock]], former colleague of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], dies. 
* '''[[1982]]''' - [[Mythcon 13]] at [[wikipedia:Chapman University|Chapman College]] in [[wikipedia:Orange, California|Orange]], [[wikipedia:California|California]].
* '''[[1983]]''' - [[Mythcon 14]] at [[wikipedia:Scripps College|Scripps College]] in [[wikipedia:Claremont, California|Claremont]], [[wikipedia:California|California]].
* '''[[2005]]''' - [[The Tolkien Society]]'s [[Tolkien 2005]] conference in [[wikipedia:Birmingham|Birmingham]], [[wikipedia:England|England]].
* '''[[2010]]''' - "[[Edge of the Wild (Tolkien art exhibit)|Edge of the Wild]]", Tolkien art exhibition in [[wikipedia:Moreton-in-Marsh|Moreton-in-Marsh]], [[wikipedia:England|England]].
* '''[[2011]]''' - [http://omentielva.com/ Omentielva Cantea] - 4th International Conference on [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s Invented Languages in [[wikipedia:Valencia|Valencia]], [[wikipedia:Spain|Spain]].

==In Arda==
* {{TA|3018}}:
** {{Cal Prison-Gandalf}}
** {{Cal Travel-Boromir}}
* {{TA|3019}}:
** After the funeral of [[Théoden]], [[Éomer]]'s guests take leave. [[Arwen]] bids farewell to her father and brothers. [[Éomer]] and [[Éowyn]] give [[Merry]] a great horn.<ref>{{App|Chief}}</ref>
